oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Compact broadband gap-coupled shorted square microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: compact microstrip antenna
broadband microstrip antenna
edge center-shorted square microstrip antenna
corner-shorted square microstrip antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various suspended compact and broadband gap-coupled variations of edge center-shorted and corner-shorted square microstrip antennas, are proposed. These configurations give larger bandwidth with a smaller total patch size as compared to square microstrip antennas. (c) 2006 .
